abstract: Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker has long acted as his own political strategist, having deep interest in and cultivated knowledge of political tactics; Walker's hands-on approach and engagement has often proved to be asset to his campaigns, but some point to potential drawbacks for 2016 presidential run.
lead_paragraph: The Wisconsin governor’s tendency to play consultant revealed itself well before his expected presidential bid and, observers say, could prove problematic.

headline.main: A Political Lifer, Scott Walker Has Long Been His Own Strategist
headline.print_headline: For a Strategist, Walker Always Turns to Himself

snippet: The Wisconsin governor’s tendency to play consultant revealed itself well before his expected presidential bid and, observers say, could prove problematic.
